Nooku TV – Anahita Social Engine for Joomla!

11 June 2009 by Johan

In the second episode of Nooku TV Pete Russell talks to web architect Rastin Mehr, of rmdstudio.com,  about Anahita, a new social engine framework for Joomla. At its core Anahita is powered by our own [Nooku Framework][1].

Rastin’s experience with Nooku Framework took Anahita to unexpected levels :

  • rmd Studio discovers Nooku Framework
  • Subsequently entirely re-wrote Anahita (using Nooku) in six weeks
  • Far more fun!
  • Could not have built Anahita without Nooku Framework
  • Plugs into Joomla!
  • “Alien-life form inside Joomla! makes Joomla better and smarter and live longer…”
  • Nooku Framework is “[the MVC core that Joomla always wanted][2]”

More information about Anahita Social Engine can be found on [Anahitapolis.com][3]

Anahita Social Engine for Joomla from Nooku on Vimeo.

[1]: framework “” [2]: http://blog.rmdstudio.com/2009/05/23/nooku-framework-is-joomlas-missing-mvc-core/ “” [3]: http://www.anahitapolis.com “”
